title: @Riotrepertoir, is there anything in the schedule for Warwick?
body:
Okay, so Warwick has been out for a long time, and he's sort of been solidified as a good fighter with high sustain, but his kit seems a little lackluster. His E is where I take most issue. I feel like it could be rolled into his passive, gaining increased range at regular intervals, like Level 1 E is the same as the would-be level 1 passive, and level 3 E would be at level 13, and level 5 E would be at Level 18 (or something, I don't think these are very good numbers, but you get the idea).

Is there anything that you know of on Warwick in coming patches?

replies.body: As far as I'm aware, there isn't a big update planned for him at the moment. Sorry if that's a disappointment to you, but I didn't want to leave you hangin'.
Eh. I wasn't expecting much, but thanks for the reply!

> [{quoted}](name=RiotRepertoir,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=RYhcz9Je,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-08-13T06:47:22.164+0000)
>
> As far as I'm aware, there isn't a big update planned for him at the moment. Sorry if that's a disappointment to you, but I didn't want to leave you hangin'.

:( is there anyway you can put him on the schedule :(
